mapper.select: SELECT c.uid uid,c.total total,c.fail fail,c.arrive_succ asucc,c.arrive_fail af,c.time time,u.username username,u.company company,u.city city from sms_user_day_count c INNER JOIN sms_user u on c.uid=u.id where c.time>=20180401 and c.time <20180901 and u.id in (1,17,18,19,20)

SELECT sum(c.total) total,sum(c.arrive_succ) asucc,sum(c.arrive_fail) af,c.uid uid,u.username username from sms_user_day_count c INNER JOIN sms_user u on c.uid=u.id where c.time>=#{starttime} and c.time<=#{endtime} and u.username=#{username}
